title: Senior Cloud Software Engineer / Developer gefunden bei Avery Dennison
subtitle: Graz
body:
Über diese Stellenanzeige

Company Description

Avery Dennison (NYSE: AVY) is a global materials science company specializing in the design and manufacture of a wide variety of labeling and functional materials. The companys products, which are used in nearly every major industry, include pressure-sensitive materials for labels and graphic applications; tapes and other bonding solutions for industrial, medical, and retail applications; tags, labels and embellishments for apparel; and radio frequency identification (RFID) solutions serving retail apparel and other markets. Headquartered in Glendale, California, the company employs more than 30,000 employees in over 50 countries. Reported sales in 2019 were $7.1 billion. Learn more atwww.averydennison.com.

Avery Dennison is an equal opportunity employer.


Job Description

What we can offer you! - Your Role:

In this is very versatile role asSenior Cloud Software Engineer / Developer,we are looking for a fresh, and agile mind to join ourhigh performing engineering teamin Graz(Austria).

Your Mission:

  • By drivingour software development efforts aroundIntelligent Labels / RFID(label.averydennison.com/intelligentlabels) digital identification platform you will be an integral part of ourvision to give every physical product or item in the world of Lifestyle / Fashion / Sport / Food etc. a unique digital ID.
  • You will use your expertise and experience todevelop a cloud-based data and analytics solution as well as an API management platform for a variety of business needs and use-cases.
  • As a mentor toour cross-functionalteam you will design and developback-end services, application features, and edge applicationswithin an agile development process, and on top,contribute to our system architecture design as well as to our integration efforts with partner and customer systems.
  • Thus, opting for our cloud software position in Austria certainly means going all out for an exciting, dynamic and multi-faceted opportunity, offering new and insightful challenges each day within the intelligent labeling industry of tomorrow.

Qualifications

What we expect from you! - Your Expertise:

  • Previouswork experience of 5+ years in the development of large-scale data applications, ideally combined with a Degreein Computer Science or related field or equivalent
  • Strong expertise in software development, technical leadership, and enterprise level applications
  • Technical expertisewith a leading hosting platform(AWS, Azure, GCP)
  • API design and implementationfamiliarity is beneficial
  • Solidsoftware development (C# / ASP.NET Core / Angular), as well asmultiple database technologies (SQL / NOSQL) such as MongoDB,CosmosDB, MS-SQL etc.are your cherry on the top
  • Fluency inEnglish,andGermanis yourextra advantage
  • Creativity and innovation,entrepreneurialspirit for growing a sustainable business to set your career at Avery Dennison


Additional Information

We offer:

  • Start-Up Atmosphere
  • Workplace Flexibility
  • Structured learning and development
  • Mentoring program
  • Competitive total rewards
  • Attractive salary package (according to Austrian IT-Kollektivvertrag up from EUR 3,449.00 gross per month (full-time))

Who we are! - Our Story:

AVERY DENNISON IS EVERYWHERE YOU LOOK -Avery Dennison is a great place to work for everyone.

At Avery Dennison we do what we love and we love what we do -Just click here to get to know us better:(Life at Avery Dennison)
